You empower your weapon to cut apart the strings that bind your opponent’s inner energies. Spend your Zeal, and Strike at a target. On a hit, the target’s essence is wracked and temporarily frayed, leaving them Sickened 1. This effect lasts for 1 round, until they recover by retching, or until the next instance of damage they take from an attack or a damaging spell. When the effect wears off, the realignment of their essence is violent and erupts with a blast of spiritual energy. The strength of this eruption is dependent on the amount of Zeal spent:

  • 1-2 Zeal: The target takes an additional 1d6 spirit damage.

  • 3-4 Zeal: The target takes an additional 2d6 spirit damage.

  • 5 Zeal: As 3-4 Zeal, but the target becomes Sickened 1 for 1 round.

If the initial Sickened effect wears off due to damage from an attack or a damaging spell, combine the additional spirit damage if it is of the same damage type for the purposes of resistances and weaknesses.
